original_text: Not only did you walk in their ways and do according to their abominations; within a very little time you were more corrupt than they in all your ways.
korean_text: 네가 그들의 행위대로만 행하지 아니하며 그 가증한 대로만 행하지 아니하고 그것을 적게 여겨서 네 모든 행위가 그보다 더욱 부패하였도다

sentences.original_text: Not only did you walk in their ways
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그들의 길로 걸었을 뿐만 아니라

sentences.original_text: and do according to their abominations
you were more corrupt than they
